Method Detail

getFieldType

public static FieldTypes getFieldType(diadem.common.web.dom.DOMElement n)
Returns a FieldType based on the HTML data of the node.

Parameters:
n - Node object to return FieldType
Returns:
value from FieldType enum relating HTML form field type of n

takeAction

public static diadem.common.web.dom.DOMElement takeAction(diadem.common.web.dom.DOMElement context,
                                                          FieldTypes ft,
                                                          java.lang.String action)
                                                   throws OXPathException,
                                                          java.io.IOException
This method takes an action on a page, including any relevant javascript events listening for said action. Inputs text. Simulates typing, rather than cutting and pasting. Typing '\n' submits the corresponding form for many elements associated with fields

Parameters:
context - the context node (upon which to take the action)
ft - type of the context node
action - action string of action
Returns:
the page input parameter after the action has occurred
Throws:
OXPathException - if malformed action token
java.io.IOException - if IO error occurs

takeAction

public static diadem.common.web.dom.DOMElement takeAction(diadem.common.web.dom.DOMElement context,
                                                          FieldTypes ft,
                                                          int action)
                                                   throws OXPathException,
                                                          java.io.IOException
This method takes an action on a page, including any relevant javascript events listening for said action Handles selection on an HTML select element

Parameters:
context - the context node (upon which to take the action)
ft - type of the context node
action - position of action
Returns:
the page input parameter after the action has occurred
Throws:
OXPathException - if malformed action token
java.io.IOException - if IO error occurs

takeAction

public static diadem.common.web.dom.DOMElement takeAction(diadem.common.web.dom.DOMElement context,
                                                          FieldTypes ft,
                                                          ActionKeywords action)
                                                   throws OXPathException,
                                                          java.io.IOException
This method takes an action on a page, including any relevant javascript events listening for said action. This method omits the optional key parameter.

Parameters:
context - the context node (upon which to take the action)
ft - type of the context node
action - keyword of action
Returns:
the page input parameter after the action has occurred
Throws:
OXPathException - if malformed action token
java.io.IOException - if IO error occurs

takeAction

public static diadem.common.web.dom.DOMElement takeAction(diadem.common.web.dom.DOMElement context,
                                                          FieldTypes ft,
                                                          ActionKeywords action,
                                                          char key)
                                                   throws OXPathException,
                                                          java.io.IOException
This method takes an action on a page, including any relevant javascript events listening for said action

Parameters:
context - the context node (upon which to take the action)
ft - type of the context node
action - keyword of action
key - character to press for keyboard events; input ignored for other events
Returns:
the page input parameter after the action has occurred
Throws:
OXPathException - if malformed action token
java.io.IOException - if IO error occurs
